title: Police: 3 killed, 2 injured in Md. shooting
content:
DISTRICT HEIGHTS, Md. (ABC7) — Two women and one man were shot to death in District Heights, Md. Friday evening, according to the Prince George's Police Department.
Police say two others were also injured during the shooting, one of which was reportedly in critical condition.
Officials say four of the victims were found inside a home in the 3100 block of Orleans Avenue around 9:30 p.m. The fifth victim was found outside the home.
Police say the shooting does not appear to be random.
This is a developing story and will be updated as details become available.
